mods.abstract: Close-up of men at work on Louisiana oyster lugger. The Louisiana oyster is considered by connoisseurs the world's finestit is not recommended by doctors in the diet for aenemia. The iodine content of all Louisiana oysters and other seafood is important in the treatment of goitre, which is less prevalent in this section than in other parts of the country.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection
